name: Daily FC Site Usage Stats
query:
SELECT 
    fc_site_url AS `FC Site`,
    DATE(DATE_SUB(`date`, INTERVAL 330 MINUTE)) AS `Usage Date`, 
    MAX(x_ratelimit_limit) / 1000000 AS `Usage Limit In Seconds`,
    MAX(x_ratelimit_limit - x_ratelimit_remaining) / 1000000 AS `Usage In Seconds`,
    MAX((x_ratelimit_limit - x_ratelimit_remaining) / (1000000 * 60 * 60)) AS `Usage In Hours`,
    MAX((x_ratelimit_limit - x_ratelimit_remaining) / x_ratelimit_limit) * 100 AS `Percentage Used`
FROM `tabFC Site Usage Log` f
GROUP BY 
    fc_site_url, 
    DATE(DATE_SUB(`date`, INTERVAL 330 MINUTE))
ORDER BY 
    `Usage Date`;
